recipesJson.name: Red forest
recipesJson.author: n33lo
recipesJson.description: My first original mix that I am satisfied is complete.  Its sweet and juicy and not too bad on coils.  Tastes good even without the sweetener, but having it really does help make the strawberries pop more than the other berries.  Don't vape right away, give it a day to let that forrest mix and dragon fruit settle out, 3 days is best.
